The web crawler should parse all types of anchor tags. Among others, the following are supported:

  • Links with schemes, paths, trailing slashes, and fragments
  • Links with schemes, paths, and trailing slashes
  • Links with schemes, paths
  • Links with schemes
  • Relative paths
  • Non-specific schemes
  • Removes duplicates
  • Removes duplicates
